thread.title: BRIEF-Cadence Bancorp Announces Upsize and Pricing of Secondary Offering of Class A Common Stock by Cadence Bancorp, LLC

title: BRIEF-Cadence Bancorp Announces Upsize and Pricing of Secondary Offering of Class A Common Stock by Cadence Bancorp, LLC
text:
#Market News February 9, 2018 / 6:01 AM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Cadence Bancorp Announces Upsize and Pricing of Secondary Offering of Class A Common Stock by Cadence Bancorp, LLC Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Cadence Bancorp: 
* CADENCE BANCORPORATION ANNOUNCES UPSIZE AND PRICING OF SECONDARY OFFERING OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK BY CADENCE BANCORP, LLC 
* CADENCE BANCORPORATION‘S SAYS SELLING SHAREHOLDER WILL SELL 8 MILLION CLASS A COMMON STOCK AT A PUBLIC OFFERING PRICE OF $25.00 PER SHARE 
* CADENCE BANCORPORATION- ‍UPON COMPLETION OF OFFERING, CADENCE BANCORP WILL OWN ABOUT 67.1% OF SELLING SHAREHOLDER‘S OUTSTANDING CLASS A COMMON STOCK​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
